title: Nidalee players rejoice!

embed.description: NewsOfLegends: League of Legends News and Content " PBE News

body:
It's been 3.5 years since Nidalee's VU, and we've FINALLY got new splash arts for Nidalee's skins! I started playing at the end of Season 3, and Nidalee was my first main. Can you imagine my excitement when I saw a Red post that Nidalee is getting updated splashes! So I waited, and waited, and waited... I've mained on and off 20 other champions now, but finally, updated splashes!

Whatya think of them? Personally, I think she looks wayyy too young in the French Maid splash and it doesn't even look like Nidalee, and the Pharaoh one could use some lightening up (I had to move my eyes close to the screen to make out any features besides glowing eyes). The rest are pretty cool though XD

replies.body: 3.5 years, damn i have played this game too long.

This is my new favourite Nidalee splash art

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CYA7gqlUe7E/V0TQh9WQ3jI/AAAAAAAA7JA/PsQVOYQIYKosTD4gJkl3GxvlTIP7ydsTwCLcB/s640/Nidalee_Splash_4.jpg

She just looks so freaking powerful...too bad I suck at Nid jungle =(

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=alWvVjvE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-26T04:44:33.706+0000)
>
> This is my new favourite Nidalee splash art
> 
> https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CYA7gqlUe7E/V0TQh9WQ3jI/AAAAAAAA7JA/PsQVOYQIYKosTD4gJkl3GxvlTIP7ydsTwCLcB/s640/Nidalee_Splash_4.jpg
> 
> She just looks so freaking powerful...too bad I suck at Nid jungle =(

Ooooooh does this mean no more Nid nerfs? (I had to try...)
hahaha I don't work on the live balance team. But even though Nid is hard to play in jungle (for me), I still think she is reallllllly strong. I usually ban her in ranked =P

>But even though Nid is hard to play in jungle (for me), I still think she is reallllllly strong. I usually ban her in ranked

Personally as an old Mid/top nidalee main i find it disappointing that she can only be played in the jungle, because she just requires too much as a jungler in terms of mechanics (mostly repeating ones) in the jungling phase.

Bewitching is the best change.
French maid makes literally no sense. Look at the skin and think about it.
Pharaoh does need some lighting adjusting though.
They really fiora'd up snow bunny. They need to adjust her face so it doesn't look like a failed disney character. 

Bewitching is the skin I will use 9/10 times.
French maid is intending her to be sort of disobeidant, sneaking a drink and sitting in the masters chair, while giving a finger in a hushing motion

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=alWvVjvE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-26T03:32:10.439+0000)
>
> Bewitching is the best change.
> French maid makes literally no sense. Look at the skin and think about it.
> Pharaoh does need some lighting adjusting though.
> They really fiora'd up snow bunny. They need to adjust her face so it doesn't look like a failed disney character. 
> 
> Bewitching is the skin I will use 9/10 times.

Read what Talon12 said about French Maid, I think that was the purpose of it (still doesn't look like Nidalee though). And that Bewitching skin.... absolutely no regrets buying it in Harrowing 2013. And I think Snow Bunny looks the most like normal Nidalee XD
A W W W W W W   Y E E E E E A A A A A A H
Is it just me or does snow bunny look like Kim Kardashian.
I got forum banned on NA for over-celebrating...
